column4: what is the tool/program called that manages the wifi connections in gnome on the toolbar?
i want to disable the default "connect automatically" when you first connect to a network
For the first thing you'd have to change the source code or manually tick that box.
you mean go in manually and untick it for each connection i make? yes i do that automatically
You'd have to edit the source code to change that behavior I think.
There is not 'tick this box automatically' tick box anywhere that I'm aware of :(
happen to know where it saves your remembered networks?
The way I find out is to drag it on the desktop, then look at the properties
